summary: This bill, the Financing Our Energy Future Act, amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend publicly traded partnership ownership to various green energy projects and transportation fuels. It expands the definition of eligible activities to include electric power generation using qualified energy resources, energy storage, combined heat and power systems, renewable fuel production, and carbon capture projects. The amendments are slated to take effect for taxable years starting after December 31, 2025.
